description.value:
Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey. Your bonus from @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Monster Hunter]{Monster Hunter} (and the bonus from @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Monster Warden]{Monster Warden} if you have it) increases from +1 to +2 for you and any allies who benefit.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feat-effects.Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter]{Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter}

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feat-effects.Effect: Legendary Monster Warden]{Effect: Legendary Monster Warden}
